outline:
1. covering, shelter, hiding place, secrecy
    1. covering, cover
    2. hiding place, shelter, secret place
    3. secrecy
      1. secrecy (of tongue being slanderous)
    4. shelter, protection
kjv_def: backbiting, covering, covert, [idiom] disguise(-th), hiding place, privily, protection, secret(-ly, place).
strongs_def: a cover (in a good or a bad, a literal or a figurative sense)
